kit.leader_skill: "Rapid Growth" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%; or AGL Type Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Quick Combo (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Kamehameha & Masenko (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Exchange of Thoughts
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 170% up; (Forever) Medium chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 50% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK 50% up; Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 24 Ki: Launches an additional Super Attack; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; After performing 4 Super Attack(s) in battle: Changes into a battle suit on the character's next attacking turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 170% up
Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
Receives an additional Ki +1 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
ATK & DEF 50% up
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 50% up
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up
lines.context: When attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Changes into a battle suit on the character's next attacking turn
lines.context: After performing 4 Super Attack(s) in battle

active_skill.name: Release Your Power!!!
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle (once only)
